name: Ghost Defense
desc: A tower defense game where you (a humble ghost) defends your house against hordes of invading humans.

name: AI Interviewer
desc: Practice your interview skills with an AI powered by Ollama or ChatGPT. Includes text-to-speech, speech-to-text, and VR!

name: Duel Blades
desc: Clash sword against sword with the enemy and come out on top!

name: Dungeon Escape
desc: Find the three keys to escape the dungeon. Some parkour involved, probably.

name: Binyl
desc: Vinyls digitized for Raspberry Pi. Tap Binyl cards to add songs, change playback, and more!

name: Western Campus Map Viewer
desc: An interior map viewer for buildings at Western University.

name: uwoInfo
desc: (Re)view courses and modules from Western University.

name: Robonokah
desc: Discord.js bot. Search for anything FFXIV-related, play minigames like Tic-Tac-Toe, and more!

name: DESOCRETE
desc: 2D shooter. A mix between Escape from Tarkov and Fallout Shelter.

name: Brickbreaker
desc: Brickbreaker game using Box2D physics and a 'breakerstreak' powerup mechanic.

name: Untitled RPG Game
desc: Simple 2D role-playing game with turn based combat.

name: Turing Miami
desc: Simple knock-off of Hotline Miami made in Turing.

name: Personal Website
desc: Yes, the one you're looking at right now.
